author: covener
msg: It's not safe to ask an SDK that doesn't define LDAP_DEFAULT_LIMIT to
use -1, because it might put it on the wire as an unsigned int.
We previously special-cased this for the MSSDK, but it needs to be more general.

author: pquerna
msg: We were recording failure as success, which means lots of things weren't quite right.

author: brett
msg: put the required repositories in by default

author: jvanzyl
msg: o can put the collector in the standard components.xml and makes unit testing work properly

author: pquerna
msg: - Include arch/apr_private_common.h from the platform apr_private.h.
